A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Plot holes\, lazy writing\, and the discarding of what would be key characters without them conteibuting to the story leaves this as a poor entry into saga. 

Solid special effects and some nice injections of of humor make this a watchable film just nothing special. I would rank it above ep 1&2 but below all the rest. 

Casual fan- Definitely go see it. 
Hardcore fan- Temper your expectations. 
Diehard fan- You will leave the theater a little angry or depressed.
